question: What is the company's Inventories?
answer: Our Inventories consists of various categories of goods and products, including raw materials, work-in-progress, finished goods, and other supportive items. The cost of these Inventories is determined under the last-in, first-out (LIFO) method using the dollar-value LIFO approach, with any increments valued based on average purchase prices during the year. Our LIFO inventories are carried at the lower of cost or market. The dollar-value LIFO approach is used for certain inventories, while the last-in, first-out (LIFO) method is used for others
